patterns: I dont want to keep living like this
responses: Please believethat your life has meaning here is the suicide hotline 1-800-273-8255

patterns: What college should I go to
What are my best college options
Where should I go after Highschool
responses: Im glad u are interested in college How good was your gpa?
were your grades good?
Its a good thing you focused on your studies u have great options because of that try using this link to find which college is best for you https://bigfuture.collegeboard.org/college-search

patterns: I did not do so well in school
responses: Its okay if ur grades werent good you still have options if ur interested in college try using this link to see where u would fit best in college https://bigfuture.collegeboard.org/college-search

patterns: I dont feel safe at home
I dont want to come home today
responses: Contact an administrator through their offices or the email list at HCPSS org website if not call 911 to get with the proper authorities.

patterns: What should I do after school
I am so bored once I get home what should I do
I want to join a club
I want to join a team
responses: We have a wide array of afterschool clubs and programs if your interested would u like to see a list or do u know which kind you'd like to join?

patterns: Yes I would like to see the list thank you
Can I see the list please?
responses: We have a number of options including NHS,FBLA,Football,Tennis,Track,BasketBall,Writing club which would u like to join?

patterns: I would like to join the National Honor Society
responses: You can get into contact with the president through their email example@gmail.com

patterns: I would like to join the Future Business Leaders of America
responses: You can get into contact with the president through their email example@gmail.com

patterns: I would like to join the tennis club
Can I join the tennis team
responses: I am glad u want to join the tennis club we can get u in contact with the president through their email example@gmail,com

patterns: I would like to join the football team
responses: The coach can be contacted at example@gmail.com

patterns: I would like to join the Track team
responses: the coach can be contacted at example@gmail.com

patterns: There is something wrong with my classes
There was a mistake with my classes and scheduling
responses: You can email your counselor about fixing ur schedule at exmample@gmail.com

patterns: Can I take a different class then I have now
I would like to change one of my classes
responses: Can you let me know what classes you would like to exchange it for?

patterns: Can I have this class over this class
I want to take this class rather than the one I have
responses: you can speak to a counselor about this change at their email at example@gmail.com

patterns: This person wont stop bothering me
I have been getting picked on for a while now can u help
I have been getting bullied by this person
responses: you can email at counselor example@gmail.com or if it is serious u can call the police

patterns: School has been stressing me out recently
I have been so stressed as of late
responses: I am sorry to hear that you can request a class change if it is school oriented. Or, you can work on your time management skills and spend time relaxing or meditating
I am a chatbot created to improve the lives of students and counselors
If something is not working correctly you can get in contact with a real administrator through the HCPSS system
Hello and welcome to howard high school you are in for a world filled with wonderful learning and experiences if u have any questions about it feel free to ask

patterns: How do I apply for jumpstart
responses: Jumpstart is a program for the growth of students in learning by going outside of this schools walls to learn u apply online to start taking classes at HCC and get a head start on your peers ask your counselor if you want to make the switch

patterns: What can I do to improve my grades
My grades arent so good this quarter
responses: we have a number of ways for you to improve ur grades we have study hall an oppurtunity for you to work on assignments and meet with teachers we have after school help for math on tuesdays where u can seek help in math and many make up oppurtunities

patterns: school is just too much for me
I need help with my mental health
responses: If you are struggling with your mental health call this number 1-800-273-TALK (8255). If you are stressed, say stressed, if you are depressed or face other issues, please be specific.

patterns: I have been feeling really down
responses: I'm sorry about that. It could be clinical, so I would reccomend talking to your physician. If it hasn't been persisting, try talking to a friend. You will be okay
School does cause anxiety. Remeber to make sure you are sleeping well and take deep breaths. Please reach out to your physician
